TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_IrregularStoneBase
TerrainDef.description: Stone paving laid decorativly. Nice to look at but requires time to position and lay.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_StoneBlocksBase
TerrainDef.description: Moderatly uniformed stone block paving. Great for walkways.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_SmoothStoneBase
TerrainDef.description: Stone, tightly packed and smoothed. Can be used to extend a cave system outside or fill gaps.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_OrnateStoneBase
TerrainDef.description: Stone, elegantly patterned and laid. Often found in grand stone structures.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_MosaicTileBase
TerrainDef.description: Small stone tiles laid to create artistic patterns. Very pretty.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_ChequeredTileBase
TerrainDef.description: Light and dark stone tiles laid in a chequered pattern.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_TribalTilesA
TerrainDef.description: Intricately decorated stone tiles.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_TribalTilesB
TerrainDef.description: Intricately decorated stone tiles.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_TribalTilesC
TerrainDef.description: Intricately decorated stone tiles.

TerrainTemplateDef.label: spacer carpet ({0})
TerrainTemplateDef.description: Soft carpet made from fibers dyed a single color. It's welcoming, cozy, and boosts the beauty of the room it's in. It's also quite flammable, and cleaning it is a laborious process.

TerrainTemplateDef.label: tribal carpet ({0})
TerrainTemplateDef.description: Soft carpet made from fibers dyed a single color. It's welcoming, cozy, and boosts the beauty of the room it's in. It's also quite flammable, and cleaning it is a laborious process.

TerrainTemplateDef.label: tribal carpet ({0})
TerrainTemplateDef.description: Soft carpet made from fibers dyed a single color. It's welcoming, cozy, and boosts the beauty of the room it's in. It's also quite flammable, and cleaning it is a laborious process.

TerrainTemplateDef.label: tribal carpet ({0})
TerrainTemplateDef.description: Soft carpet made from fibers dyed a single color. It's welcoming, cozy, and boosts the beauty of the room it's in. It's also quite flammable, and cleaning it is a laborious process.

TerrainTemplateDef.label: art deco carpet ({0})
TerrainTemplateDef.description: Soft carpet made from fibers dyed a single color. It's welcoming, cozy, and boosts the beauty of the room it's in. It's also quite flammable, and cleaning it is a laborious process.

TerrainDef.label: astroflora
TerrainDef.description: Imitation grass and flowers for that maintenance-free natural look.

TerrainDef.label: astrorock
TerrainDef.description: Smooth, metallic stones laid decoratively over astroturf. Makes an excellent decorative path or garden border.

TerrainDef.label: burned astroflora
TerrainDef.description: Burned-out astroturf carpet.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_ConcreteFloorBase
TerrainDef.label: blood-stained concrete
TerrainDef.description: Rough concrete with blood stains, imitated or otherwise. Adds to the aestetic of a butchering or torture room.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_PavedTileFloorBase
TerrainDef.label: blood-stained paved tile
TerrainDef.description: Paved Concrete tiles with added blood stains for that added horror feel.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_ColouredConcreteBase
TerrainDef.label: white painted concrete
TerrainDef.description: Rough, painted concrete. It is fast to walk on, easy to lay and can help with organising storage.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_HazardConcreteBase
TerrainDef.label: white hazard concrete
TerrainDef.description: Rough concrete painted with hazard lines found through-out developed worlds. Great for marking off danger zones.

TerrainDef.label: cross wood floor
TerrainDef.description: Crossed wood flooring creates a bouncy, warm and durable surface to live and walk on.

TerrainDef.label: mosaic wood floor
TerrainDef.description: Mosaic wood flooring has a decorative, elegant look to it while remaining durable and quick to lay.

TerrainDef.label: ornate wood floor
TerrainDef.description: Ornate wood flooring provides a rich, extravagent finish while remaining practical and hard-wearing.

TerrainDef.label: spacer wood floor
TerrainDef.description: Spacer-age wooden flooring combines the sleek, clean lines of future design with the warmth and charm of polished wood.

TerrainDef.label: dark wood floor
TerrainDef.description: Wood plank flooring for that warm, homey feeling. While it is quick to lay, it is also very flammable.

TerrainDef.label: dark cross wood floor
TerrainDef.description: Crossed wood flooring creates a bouncy, warm and durable surface to live and walk on.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_RustyTileBase
TerrainDef.label: rusty steel tile
TerrainDef.description: Rusty steel tiles for that factory look.

TerrainDef.label: Bloody steel tile
TerrainDef.description: rusty blood-stained steel tiles, easy to clean, but still ugly... and a little creepy.

TerrainDef.label: rusty sheet tile
TerrainDef.description: Quick-laying metal sheets, easy clean and durable.

TerrainDef.label: bloody sheet tile
TerrainDef.description: blood-stained quick-laying metal sheets, easy clean and durable.

TerrainDef.label: rusty panel tile
TerrainDef.description: Quick-laying metal panels, easy clean and durable.

TerrainDef.label: bloody panel tile
TerrainDef.description: blood-stained quick-laying metal panels, easy clean and durable.

TerrainDef.label: rusty colony tile
TerrainDef.description: practical colony flooring, rusted with exposure to the elements.

TerrainDef.label: rusty cargo tile
TerrainDef.description: practical station flooring, rusted with exposure to the elements.

TerrainDef.label: rusty metal grid
TerrainDef.description: practical colony flooring, rusted with exposure to the elements.

TerrainDef.label: bloody metal grid
TerrainDef.description: practical station flooring, rusted with exposure to the elements.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_SterileTileBase
TerrainDef.label: sterile sheet tile
TerrainDef.description: sterile metal sheet.

TerrainDef.label: bloody sheet tile
TerrainDef.description: blood-stained sterile metal sheet.

TerrainDef.label: sterile grid
TerrainDef.description: sterile metal grid.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_SteelTileBase
TerrainDef.label: rough metal tile
TerrainDef.description: a heavy duty metal flooring. Great for high traffic areas.

TerrainDef.label: steel cargo tile
TerrainDef.description: a heavy duty metal flooring. Great for high traffic areas.

TerrainDef.label: steel colony tile
TerrainDef.description: a sleek, futuristic-looking metal tile usually found in space stations.

TerrainDef.label: steel panel tile
TerrainDef.description: purposely-cut irregular metal tiles for totallitarian artistic effect.

TerrainDef.label: steel sheet tile
TerrainDef.description: sheet metal tiling, quick to lay and robust.

TerrainDef.label: steel grid
TerrainDef.description: standard metal grid.

TerrainDef.Name: Bombadier_PlasteelTileBase
TerrainDef.label: plasteel tile
TerrainDef.description: Metal tiles, for that spaceship look. They are pretty, and the smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness.

TerrainDef.label: rough plasteel tile
TerrainDef.description: a heavy duty plasteel flooring.

TerrainDef.label: plasteel cargo tile
TerrainDef.description: a heavy duty metal flooring. Great for high traffic areas.

TerrainDef.description: purposely-cut irregular metal tiles for totallitarian artistic effect.

TerrainDef.label: rough uranium tile
TerrainDef.description: a heavy duty uranium floor.

TerrainDef.description: a heavy duty metal flooring. Great for high traffic areas.
